channel.title: Community on Steph de Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Steph de Silva

item.title: CPA Emerging Leaders Conference
item.description: I had the opportunity to talk at the CPA Emerging Leaders Conference today in Melbourne, then again next week in Sydney. It was a great crowd with a really interesting mix of perspectives. I was talking about Creating data driven value and insights, which was aimed at showing an already very data literate group of people (accountants!) how to get started with data driven thinking. My thoughts on getting started come down to five things:

Committee Beyond syntax, towards culture: the potentiality of deep open source communities

item.title: Pro Bono Work
item.description: I often take on pro bono work for organisations that need help developing a data strategy or delivering a data science project. The kinds of things I do for not for profits include advice on research design, analysis, modelling, or training data analysts. I may not always be able to say yes, but if you’re a not for profit or research group who need a hand, please don’t hesitate to ask.
